content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i saw a red/orange ball moving slowly in the sky yesterday near the castlefun park area in abbotsford - bc - canada, right above highway one.
 
it was a red/orange dot, quite large, almost the size of a airplane light. completely silent, and steady in the sky, not as tall as where airplanes would fly.
 
the red light dropped a little red light after about 30-40 seconds. the little red light faded away as it fell. then, the big red light moved to the right and a little (star sized) fire color dot came off it.
 
the red light faded away, and the little fire color dot moved away, first east, then it made a big circle and started heading west very fast while losing altitude, until it disappeared near a farm land in that region.
 
we turned around and went into that farm, shut the headlights, but could not see anything at all.
 
very freaky!
 
date: october 31st 2011
exactly at 10:33 pm
 
please dont post my name. just the report.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: red/orange ball moving slowly in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was going to report this last night, but didn't. i have never seen or reported anything weird like this. i searched again today and saw three others reported the exact same thing. two reports in california and one close to me in kansas. my story is pretty much the same as the other three. i didn't notice any temp change like the one person said though. i was sitting in my driveway passing out treats and waiting for my family to get back from trick or treating. at 7:30pm central time,i glanced up in the southeast sky at about 45-55 degrees up from the horizon and noticed what i thought were two bright planets diaganol of each other. they were totally stationary. i noticed in the other reports they were vertical of each other and in another part of the sky. i don't know if that has to do with where they are in the u.S. compared to where these things were in the sky. anyway, i watched them about 60 seconds. i don't know how long they were there before i noticed them. then one faded and about 4 seconds later, the other. weird. i don't think it was any alien action, but i would like to know what it was. i thoght maybe military flares, but they were not falling. then when it was seen in california, i knew that wasn't the case.
content.summary: Two venus like objects diaganol of each other in the southeast sky one fades then the other.

content.detailedDescription:
In march of 2005, i was visiting my wife in mexico beach fl.At apprx. 0715 i went out on the balcony to smoke a cigar. her apartment was on the beach and as i looked across st joe bay,i saw a brilliant white light off the tip of cape san blas. i knew that it was not a planet or a star because it wasn't there the night before.I got my binoculars out and when i looked at the white light i saw the most brilliant red and green lights i have ever seen and no trace of white light . the lights did not flicker but remained constant. as i am looking at what ever it was, i saw an identical green and red light appear to separate from it and start to go downward slowly. when it had sank down to the point where i was about to loose sight of the top most object in my binocs.(i was resting them on the balcony railing to keep vibrations down), it stopped and started slowly rising back up. it then rejoined the first object. it then started moving in a westward direction very slowly. after it had moved a short distance it once again stopped , and once again a red and green light separated from it and started going down slowly. it did the exact same thing again. after it rose back up and rejoined the other object, it looked as though it took a turn southward and just faded away. i would add that i was a fire fighter in the air force and worked on the flight line. these colored lights i saw were unlike any color i have ever seen. the closest to them would be the day-glo paints from the black light days and even that was not as brilliant. i would also add that at first i thought it may have been an f-22 raptor because tyndal air force base was testing them at the time and they can hover but i don't thik they can do what i saw.
 by the way, my wife witnessed it as well. she had gone to the store and returned just in time to see it.I gave her the binocs and asked what do you see. she said"you mean that bright green and red light ?" i said "thats it!" i can't tell you how glad i was to have a witness. my feelings on what i saw was that i had seen something out of the ordinary.I don't know what it was but i know what it wasn't.
respectfully, submitted
robert l.Register
content.summary: Was at mexico beach and saw lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Last night my wife and i were travelling east on the bluegrass parkway after trick-or-treating back home in owensboro with our 16 month old little girl and family. we've lived in lexington for years but we make this trip back to owensboro every  halloween to trick or treat with my nieces and nephews. last night at 1am i was coming up to the first bardstown exit. this exit has a small hotel and a gas station and is always unusually well lit. as i rounded the corner and the overpass came into view i noticed a plane (?) with bright lights in the direction of the hotel. i was immediately struck by the altitude and size of the plane. it was very, very low and large. 747 large. it was travelling southwest. as i passed under the overpass i looked up and it was directly overhead. i looked up was able to catch a glimpse of it because the light from the exit dimly lit the underbelly. it wasn't smooth or very aerodynamically shaped. nothing like you'd associate with a current gen stealth aircraft like the b-2, f-22 or jsf. it also wasn't like a 1st gen stealth aircraft with faceted angles. it was very "mechanical" looking for lack of a better term. i only saw it briefly and only the center portion but at the time the closest thing my mind could match the shape and struture to was, oddly enough, an f-14 tomcat. but much, much bigger. the other oddity was the speed. if it was a jet then it would have been dangerously close to stalling. i honestly think it might have been hard to even generate aerodynamic lift at that speed. it's hard to judge the exact speed given the size of it but using landmarks and reference points i'd have to guessimate 120 mph. 
 
at this point i was rather confused and having trouble making sense with what i'd just seen. 30 seconds to a minute later i look off to the left side of the road i see another one. this one had already passed so i was getting the view from the rear. i pulled off to the side and as i ran over the rumble strips my wife woke up (she was asleep in the back with our little girl). i rolled down the driver's window and watched it continue off into the distance. it was wide. how wide is hard to say. at this point by wife is wondering why in the world we're sitting on the side of the parkway. i started to drive off and told her that i had just seen something very unusual. as i fumbled around and tries to explain it, to my amazement i see another one directly in from of us. my wife comments that it looks like a helicopter. i take a second and agree because it looks smaller and is travelling low and slow like you'd expect to see from a helicopter,. but as we continue on and watch it fly into the distance (over the coors distributing plant of the parkway) we realize that we'd only seen the side view when it was in front of us. as it travelled further away we were perpendicular to it we were then able to see the width of the craft. again, very wide. keep mind my wife and i just saw an a380 in miami two weeks ago so we're both familiar with large aircraft. 
 
a couple miles up the road as we conversed about what we just witnessed we notice a 4th craft off to the right side of the road. i immediately pulled off the parkway (in a construction zone), turned off the car and jumped out. she rolled her window down in the back and we both watched it fly by completely silent. completely silent. no thump-thump, no tail rotor, no turbines, nothing.
 
i'm completely stumped here. i don't for one second believe these craft were something other worldly but not much about them makes sense. if they were covert military aircraft then why such a low flight pattern that allows then to be spotted from the ground? if they're covert then why bother with lights? why would a pilot risk flying so low in such a large aircraft? i'm hesitant to start to think outside the box on how these craft were able to remain airborn at such low speeds and do so silently but i'm out of possible answers.
content.summary: Multiple craft

content.detailedDescription: I was in the car with my daughter-in-law and two small grandsons, while trick-or-treating last night (10-31-11).  we were stopped at a light on a busy street when i noticed a huge, circular object moving right toward us from the north.  it had pulsating and blinking multi-colored lights, as well as extremely bright, white lights.  it came very close and hovered over all the cars and buildings, through several light changes (everyone who saw it just sat where they were!), then slowly began to move off toward the sw in an  arcing path.  when we first saw it, it was as if it was approaching us with its bottom facing us, (as if on a vertical orientation, and as it retreated, it turned flat (or horizontal), at times moving very slowly, then accelerating very quickly.  it would completely disappear from time to time.  we followed it, both of us taking turns video-ing it with our phones.  it at times acted as if it were playing a game with us, hiding,then appearing very close so we could see details, including a dome-like appendage on the bottom-center.  then it would speed off, eventually making a complete circle over our area and winding up hovering over the neighborhood where we had originally been headed.  it disappeared again, as we got out of the car to go tell our friends, and many people in the neighborhood came running up asking if we saw it, too!  it returned from low on the northern horizon, hovered directly over us, at times turning on its end, as before, and at other times performing all sorts of movements that seemed to defy regular laws of physics!  someone said the news was saying it was a group of 7 precision-flight small plane operators, performing a fly-by over the football stadium, but we saw this very closely and it was not a group of small planes (or large ones)!  it was completely circular and everything moved as one, without fail.  it made very little noise, a pleasant, low, oscillating hum, that i have never heard before, nor had anyone else.  definitely not the sound of any plane or helicopter i have ever heard.  this sky-line ballet went on for over an hour and toward the end, the craft had turned to a horizontal position and forcefully ejected a much smaller, red, orb-like object, then shot off never to be seen by us again.  the red orb hovered for many minutes, its light just pulsating and varying in intensity of frequency, then it began moving, slowly at first, then it also shot off in the same direction as the large craft and we never saw it again, either.  it had no sound.  we all felt very affected on many levels.  we were, of course, very excited, skeptical (kept trying to google any news about it but phones were not working well), happy (no one seemed to  feel frightened or upset), and tingly.  personally, i felt like i had lost a huge chunk of time, and felt an enormous amount of high-frequency energy around me and running through me!  i felt hopeful, and could not sleep the rest of the night.  the small children were also elated, and had lots of energy as well.  today, i could find no news on tv or the net, other than mufon, about this!  i am just so sad that my phone camera could not capture the beauty and enormity of this thing!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: One extremely large, circular, disc-like main ship, bright, pulsating lights of all colors and white, + small, red,  orb-like shape ejected toward the end, which stayed behind, hovered for many minutes, then shot off after the large craft!

content.detailedDescription:
01.11.2011,17:40: 
ich ging von unserem sch���nem aussichtsberg zur���ck nach hause.Schon auf dem "berg" ist mir ein ungew���hnlich helles licht aufgefallen.Nun auf unserer gro���en drachenwiese hab ich das object mit meinem handy (8,1 megapixel) fotografiert. es handelt sich den anschein nach wohl um ein dreieck.
18:15:
nachdem ich nach hause gegangen war nahm ich jetzt eine spiegelreflexkamera (16,1 megapixel) die erstaunlichen photos k���nnt ihr im anhang sehen.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been seeing these objects for 2 years now they come down shine bright then fly back up. it seem like they come every time i sit out side at night.
i have also seen what people call probe's  single white orb like ufo's in the day light. i have video of everything going back to 2009 online. it doesn't matter where i live they are able to find me and come. 

[link moved to field investigator section/cms/tg]


i also know you have been looking for me since my questionable video went viral on the internet. 
here footage of the same thing from last year same time and date.

[link moved to field investigator section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Engery ufo

content.detailedDescription: I had been taking a customary walk around my neighborhood and stopped at my driveway to try to spot a hawk that was making hawk sounds from a group of trees behind my neighbor's house. his trees were around 80 to 100 ft high. slowly this ufo appeared to rise up from behind the trees. my first thought was excitement that i was going to see my first ufo. then i realized that it only appeared to rise up. it was moving in a straight line. i then thought it was a dirigible and i started looking for a gondola, windows, lettering or towing a sign. there were none and i became less excited. there were no engines, propellers, jets nor steering mechanisms. the bottom half was silver colored and the top blue of what i could see. it didn't appear to be over 200 ft high and about 100+/- ft long and 20/30 feet in diameter. it was moving in a straight line from the south in a north/north west direction at 30mph+/-. i disappeared out of site and i thought no more about it for a day or 2.
content.summary: Elongated football shape. 100ft+/- bottom half silver color. upper half blue. no sound, steering mechanism, port holes, windows, propellers and flew slowly (30mph) & steadily from the south in n/nw direcrtion.

content.detailedDescription: I saw one or two stationary objects with lights high in the sky above my head and just to the north that looked like stars at aprox 630 to 700 am, my grandfather who is a preacher was also with me and witnessed the event, the object had 3 lights in a straight line and 3 more lights in the shape of a triangle. i dont no if it was 1 object or 2 but the lights would randomly pulsate. you would look up and there would be 4 lights, then 6 lights then 3 lights then 6 again, it continued for a very long time. i also saw 3 separate star like objects in the sky traveling from west to east from the same location as the large object. first there was a single star like light moving across the night sky and i took it as possibly a satellite since i have viewed them before in the night sky, then about 5 minutes later there were 2 of them together, i no they were not one object cause one of them would slow down and speed up in order to catch up with the other, then one of the lights disappeared and the other continued on until it was out of sight. i also saw several shooting stars during this half hour period.It started to get light outside and i couldnt see the large group of lights anymore
content.summary: Was in truck going hunting early morning, star gazing

content.detailedDescription: I was at the location listed in phoenix just walking onto a roof when i immediately observed what looked like a disc-string of flames out in the distance (20+ miles). the string was like a forest fire reaching the top of a mountain from the opposite side. as i walked closer to the edge the flames extinguished from left to right. thinking this was because i moved forward i began walking backwards and after about 20 feet the flames slowly reappeared but from left to right not right to left as expected which gave me an eerie feeling. they were no longer disc-shaped but in a row. i stopped and walked forward again to the edge of the roof and the flames did not extinguish this time. after about 30 seconds they extinguished in the same manner. about 1 minute later the sting of flames reappeared lower in the sky than before. i was using freeway lights in the distance to judge its movement.This lasted for only 30 seconds and then they extinguished again from left to right. this appeared to be in the goodyear/buckeye/estrella mountain area. i would say it could have been anywhere from 1/4 mile to 3/4 long. i new it could have been a forest fire but none were reported and its behavior was all too unusual.
content.summary: String of flame-like object(s) lighting up like fire and extinguishing in a row

content.detailedDescription: Just leaving longhorn steakhouse saturday night when my wife and i noticed what at first look like a balloon floating through the sky. i then noticed the speed that it was traveling at and that it was in a perfect line. not like a balloon that was caught in a wind current. it then stopped and hovered for aprox. ten second before i had to move ny car since i was blocking traffic. i thoose few seconds it took me to park, the object left with no trace in sight. there were very few clouds that evening and it was still light enough for me to see for many miles above the horizon.I never saw the object again after that.
content.summary: Traveled inline across sky. after about 1/8 mile stoped and hovered. color was opaque. wtitnessed by spouse.

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling in my vehicle on us 127 north about 12:45 am coming home from work, as i looked out of the passenger window to glance at the stars on the clear night i saw what at first was a star, then seen that the object had 3 lights in the shape of a triangle, the light in the back of the 3 lights gave off a small trail. the object was high, but larger than the stars in the sky and there were no cellular phone towers in the area. i proceeded up the road and turned around and went back to observe the lights and it was no longer in sight.
i felt really anxious as well as scared to see this, it was not normal and i had realized it at the time, i had thought about contacting 911 but did not.
i lost sight of the object when i traveled yup the road and turned back around to observe it.
content.summary: Apeared to have 2 or 3 lights, none flashing, triangular shaped. middle light showed trail

content.detailedDescription: Went out to get dog approximately 9:45pm on very clear night . out in field next to our property above the tree line approximately 2 football fields away was a large glowing orange object with the red aura floating then very quickly disappearing leaving a light path. ran quickly inside, locking my doors, very upset.
content.summary: Clear night, bright orange object with red aura hoovered then quickly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend, kids, girlfriend and her kids were trick/treating. when my friend pointed to the sky. we saw two extra bright lights near a third but less bright star. we assumed they were stars. it was a clear cold night and the entire sky was visible and they were some of the only stars visible. i watch the sky often at night and because of light pollution normally many stars are not visible. only super bright planets and such. i immediately told my friend that those bright stars looked unnatural. i said wow those are so bright and not unusually in sky. 
as we were talking, the lower right star-orb-light thinging began to wobble a little and then fade, disappearing before our eyes. my friend said did you just see that. as we were looking and talking in disbelief the second orb-light did the same thing. we could not believe our eyes and confirmed many times what we had just saw. it was trully bizarre. now i see we are not the only ones who have described what we saw almost exactly.
content.summary: Two bright lights vertical of each other disappear before eyes

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were taking the kids trick or treating. while we were waiting on the kids to knock on a door, i noticed two stars in the sky that were extremely bright.  i said to my husband, look how bright those stars are, you would think i would have noticed then before as bright as they are side by side. he said, well let's pull up google star gazing ap and see what they are.  as he pulled his phone out, i kept my eyes on the lights.  i noticed them begin to fade, i thought my vision was playing tricks on me, but my husband was noticing it too. we watched them completely disappear right before our eyes. two to three minutes later, the outside temperature felt ten degrees warmer outside.
content.summary: Two lights like very bright stars side by side

content.detailedDescription: first of all if these objects are using space and time to bend the field in front of them for propulsion then that would explain the uncany calm prior to the sighting. i should of been well within the field of that when it went by. it was saturday the 15th of oct. between 9:15 and 9:20 p.M.  was standing outside as i usually do every night and caught this object in my vision off to the right side. it was 400ft west and 800 to 1000ft high. it had two lights one foward and one aft and a lenth of approx. 400ft. it looked oblonged, however it could of been bigger as it was dark and it was also the dark of the moon. it's total travel distance from my point of view was right at 8 tenths of a mile, using land marks.  no sound what so ever. did find it distubing that there was not a dog barking or geese making noise at that time and thats not normal here. have not done the math to compute the speed but will when i get time to do so. object distance traveld was 8 tenths of a mile in 3 or 4 seconds. i used land marks and line of sight to come up with this. the army tought us well. it should of pasted right over the west edge of the ames airport. if i had not been looking in that direction that night i would have never seen it, it was to fast.
content.summary: Animals fall silent as large object passes

content.detailedDescription: Standing in driveway. watched 3 orange lights in the nw sky come into view at a slow pace...Thought helicopter but felt odd that the lights were orange.  they stopped and hovered. one orage light went west while the other appeared to go east. the center light stayed in position. ran in house to get camera...Came out only one orange light in sky. eventually it headed sw and disappeared. it actually looked like it went behind clouds (disappeared) but do not think there were any clouds out there thich enough to hide bright object. went in house and was not sure what just happened. laughed it off and thought too bad i did not have camera first time. maybe3 15 minutes later i went out not expecting to see the lights but they were back. this time in the nw sky and one over the other resembling the letter i. grabed camera tio take picture. by time i looked into viewfinder 2 were gone and again only one was left. called daughter who lives 30 minutes north of cinncinati to tell of expereince. 30 minutes later (9:30pm) she called and sadi dad i see them. she only saw 2 orange lights. also witnessing the event was her husband. checked the news and police and no reports filed.
content.summary: 3 orange lights in v shape heading sw.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i with our kids were trick or treating. the sky was very clear with only a few stars out. my girlfriend pointed to sky to show me to lights in sky that appeared to be like stars and were very bright and close together. they looked unnatural and we were commenting on that fact when the lower orb faded and disappeared and then the upper one. we were freaked out and kept saying did you just see what i saw and we agreed to very large bright objects just disappeared from sight. crazy
content.summary: Two lights in sky star like but unnatural looking very bright then one disappeared then other

content.detailedDescription: Halloween night around 8, heading to swopeparkway health center on bluepkwy in kansas city mo for a trick or treat event, i saw one of the parking guards pointing and i looked and it was a huge circular object in the sky with lots of lights, i tried to get it on my camera phone but it took off really fast, it was lots of people outside who witnessed it, it looked like the bottom of a flying saucer, huge....., i was really shocked because it was in the area where i saw another ufo about a month ago, i never thought i would see anything like that again in my life, but i did, shocking....
content.summary: It was huge. it was like a circle with lots of lights

content.detailedDescription: As iwas driving home from a friends house i saw what appeared to be searchlights in the sky but they went in random directions; there were three in all,, one went across the sky horizontally back and forth, one appeared and shot straight out then disappeared, then another did the same thing only in a different direction.  i had stopped my car and watch; the lights were coming from what looked like a bright star, but it grew even brighter,,,,,,, then turned a reddish color and started moving.  it blazed accross the sky and then slowed down andstarted to blink, red/white and then grew very dim and disappeared. i didnt see itanymore.I have noticed things like this a few timse out here, we're in a very rural area with very little air traffic.. we call them blinkies, and at times have seen up to 27 of them in a 10 minute period or so.  sometimes they seem like they have a dim white glow around them,,, other times they just literally appear from nowhere and either blink, or suddenly start moving.  they can stop and hover, grow very dim, get very bright, change to a reddish color, and scoot extremely fast accross the sky.  they can change directions like a barrel racer, and can get very low to the ground at times.  i used to be very scared of them, but ive seen them so often out here now( as well as about 9 other people) that i know im not crazy. i noticed a internet posting about lights seen in lees summit, mo., and thats not very far from here(about 20 minutes drive on the back roads). thats how i found your website.
content.summary: Starlike object grew brighter then moved rapidly and emitted beams of light

content.detailedDescription: Thought i was looking at a bright star till it started moving then it started making abrupt changes in movement.  it then went back in to a statuary position.  it does this intermittently.  it's still out there mimic a star with slight changes every five to ten minutes. with frequent movement that go from fast and jerky to slow but noticeable. took some video but it was hard to stay still and gave up.
content.summary: Starlike object changes direction in no particular pattern still out there right now

content.detailedDescription: I was having a smoke outside my wife was out with me. we were looking at the stars when we saw an extremely bright light shoot across the sky and stop dead in its tracks. then it appeared to split into3 sections and each section shot a different direction. about 20 second later 3 military looking planes came from the same direction the light did and they split up and followed there lights. the most crazy thing i've seen worth a witness.
content.summary: Light shot across the sky and shot into 3 directions

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving to take our child trick-or-treating. my car was heading west on hwy 50 and had just passed the hwy 7 exit. on the north side of hwy 50 to the north west i saw a long line of lights moving accross the sky to the north. i pointed at them and told my wife to look because it was such a very long line of lights. they quickly changed direction and moved south east bound right at us. the line of lights moved up as the bottom of the disc shaped ufo was exposed. the bottom was covered in a very large amount of spot lights. as the disc came closer and decended it tilted so far up that the bottom part of the disc with all the spot lights was completely visable. one of the spot lights on the bottom caught my eye as the rest of them shown down. the bottom was curved just like a saucer. it was so gigantic and low to the ground i decided to slow down to 50 mph and took the first u-turn available. cars all around me were slowing down. i passed hwy 7 again and turned north. i watched the ufo decend and then hover to the north west. the night sky lit up with a flash of light in a perfect circle around the ufo. i kept my eyes in the sky but didn't see it again. i did notice shortly after the ufo sighting an unusual amount of normal aircraft activity was everyhere. two planes flying at the same low altitude came from the east flying west bound. they flew right over the location the ufo seemed to land but kept going.
content.summary: 10/31/11 lee's summit, mo disc ufo

content.detailedDescription:
my friend and i were sitting on a picnic table at a park in marblehead, ma in the early 80's. maybe 1981. it was summer. the park was just a couple blocks from the ocean. we were eating dinner and then we both looked up as a very large silent black triangle object passed directly overhead. it was at least as large as a football field. it moved very slowly.  i noted no lights. i never saw the top of it. it was moving from west to east heading towards the ocean. it was above the tree tops, but not by much, maybe 150-200 feet. it was just begining dusk and i think it darkened the sky which is why we both looked up. it was almost halfway over us when we first saw it. we watched until it disappeared from view in the tree line. we asked each other "did you see that?". we never mentioned it or talked about it again. we were both in our 20's, not drinking or taking drugs. i was in college. 
i had no idea what it was, but i always wonder how something so big could move so slow and not make any noise or breeze.  years later when i said anything, people always said it was a stealth. i have since learned they don't move like that and i don't really know that they had them in the early eighties.
content.summary: Large black triangle shaped object passed directly over us. made no noise.

content.detailedDescription:
In september of 2004 during day light late in the afternoon after 5:00 p.M. i was kneeling on my driveway and putting air into the tires of my 2001 toyota prius.  after filling the left-rear tire i stood up and glanced up at the sky at a seventy or seventy-five degree angle.  i was surprised to see half of a flying disc with a bump in the middle (its crew compartment i guess), gray-lead in color, stuck between two clouds with a wave or liquid of some kind finishing to cover the remaining part of the spaceship.  there was nothing that made me to first notice the object, it was just there, by chance, in my line of sight as i looked up into the sky.  the spaceship looked like it was falling into quicksilver (mercury), but upwards in the sky between two clouds.  if you hold a quarter (coin) in mercury halfway and see how the liquid covers half of the coin, that is what i saw.  as a student in high school years ago in chemistry class, i saw my teacher demonstrate holding a coin in mercury and for what purpose i don't remember; however, seeing this ufo do this, clicked my high school memory and i can't get this view of this ufo doing this out of my mind.  i have tried to forget over the years, but i am unable to do that, this image just keeps sticking in my mind.

i saw this happen in about ten or twelve seconds and i could not keep my eyes off of what was happening, it stunned me (it was so unusual an occurrence which i was not prepared to see). as this wave or liquid finished covering the half of the flying disc that i could see, the whole ship became invisible and i believe it flew into outer space between these two big clouds that were so many hundreds of feet apart, so it could not be detected visually as it continued flying on its course in one direction.  after i saw this happen, i could not believe what i saw and i felt that the sighting stunned me (something i was surprised to see and was unprepared to see).  i felt alittle frightened (scare) and i told my wife after i went inside my house, but she did not believe me.

i lost sight of the disc half once it became covered with this wave or liquid that made it invisible (i assumed it continued on in its straight flight path into outer space).  i hope i never see anything like this ever again.  a drawing of what i witnessed (saw) is attached to this report.

***in november 1994 i was abducted from my hotel room in virginia beach, virginia by alien beings called grays.  in april 1995 i moved to seoul, south korea and a large flying disc was sighted over the city of seoul.
my supervisor had a english printed newspaper with a picture of it, but he gave it to someone and i could not locate the newspaper or the name of the publisher.
content.summary: Putting air into my car's tires in my driveway,  i briefly took a glance at the sky after standing up and saw half of a gray-lead colored flying disc with a bump in the middle between two clouds cloaking itself to become invisible.   i will never forget!!

content.detailedDescription: Its halloween. me and my wife were taking my son out trick or treating around 6:30pm or 6:40pm pacific time usa. we live in palmdale ca. we were talking to our neighbor when she saw 2 lights in the north east that were brighter than normal so they got my attention. 1 was larger than the other 1 looked like the north star but brighter, that was the big one. the small one looked like a star.As i focused on them we noticed they were moving in the same direction slow. they never changed directions. they moved around 3 to 4 minutes then they vanished.We all saw the same thing.
content.summary: We seen 2 lights 1 big 1 small north east head east and vanish

content.detailedDescription:
Someone else had to see this, if not, then i saw something personal tonight i have never seen before nor can explain. i was in altadena tonight eaton canyon, and was hiking in the mountains from about 3pm until around 745pm.  i was there after dark, i was texting for about 30 min at the and of my hike looking down at my phone facing north at the mountains, i started looking up at them after i finished, i had been hiking praying in this spot for over 3 hours a spot i go to often to meditate,  i knew from star/moon gazing earlier during the day up until night, that the moon was behind me to the left. so, at approx 7pm (i checked the time on my phone right after) as i turned around to check the moon's position, which was back down the valley (i think facing south west), 

i immediately noticed about 45deg up to the left of the moon, there were 3 "stars",  two were brighter and i know i handn't noticed or seen them before, they were strangely brighter than the star below them, but about same size, they got brighter as i watched, they seemed stationary at first so thats why i thought they were stars, and both stayed at the same angle almost floating, there was another star below them i was using to compare them figuring they were just bright stars as i watched i noticed the two bright ones started to move/pivot just slightly to the rt, at that point i felt they were really not stars  but something else, intirely, i felt this odd feeling come over me like something was observing me, they were floating and then did a pivot to rt, seemed to  fall at first then rise then fade away or just move away i thik the the upper rt, away from me at incredible speeds,or just faded, of this im not sure, it was hard to say.  i only saw two white star orbs,  but there may have been more, i now have the feeling it had been there longer than i realized it was up there before turning around and seeing them,  so my visual sigting might vary from others if anyone else saw this, and it was short, it was about 30 sec, it was not a flash or quick thing.  i observed them brighten, fade and move together, it was very strange.

im pretty sure they were connected, as they moved in tandem and faded in tandem, they were at first stationary, kinda hovering in one place i was using the star below as a reference, and also to compare brightness, at first they were above a fixed star one above the other, like at this angle to my view i will use a slash  /.   vertically one above one below at slight angle, they kinda shimmered got brighter as they stayed in  place they were similar brightness to a star slightly brighter then got much brighter before fading, and they pivoted/moved,  that's why at first,thought they were stars but, then they appeared to fall to the rt. just so much movement that i was checking myself to see if they were moving.. i shouted "their/your moving!" almost to convince myself they werent.  

i watched and watched for several seconds, then they seemed to just gently fall to the right in tandem, hover, then they either faded or rose away from me it appeared they faded up to the rt not just out..  it was very strange, these two were just above another star on the horizon to the rt, that i dont know the name of yet, (but i will) , these two were bright enough and shimmering  a very bright light so much that i gasped when i first saw them, and really said it outloud to my surprise "what the heck is that?" 

to be honest i figured at first maybe the clouds had covered the two "stars" so thats why they faded, but i watched  and watched to see if they reappered behind a the cloud bank, but it really was clear tonight actually, with some marine layer, which is what i figured hid them since they "faded",  but what was strange is the star that was below them didnt fade, so i realized there were no clouds.   

something happened i want to know if others saw this, someone had to!

sorry i dont have pictures, since it was dark and only lasted 30 sec or so!

thanks!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: Two odd starlike glowing orbs that i thought were very bright stars appeared behind me, i gasped as they fell like a leaf almost togther so slightly to rt, then either vanished or moved away ascending up, faded as if cloud covered , but it was clear! .

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my driveway in a chair, handing out candy for halloween, very clam out no clouds beautiful evening moon was at a crecent, just enjoying the peacefulness, then i look up at the sky facing south i saw in the sky 2 bright objects, at first i thought they were jets in formation with there lights on, as i kept watching they werent moving they were hovering, then the one a little lower, lights got dimmer and dimmer, i was in awe never have ever seen anything like this,  then the other one did the same thing just slowly dimed its light's out. best way to discribe it would be the phoinex light's all over again with this being in  belton  missouri and only 2 of them and for a shorter time by best guess is they were there for a min or 2 i watched them for at least one min.
content.summary: Lights in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the skyline and noticed this object in the sky.  as it came over head it looked  semi transparent. it had no noticable wings and was tubular in shape. these type of craft come through this area quite often. however  this one was rather large. it was about 30 to 40 feet in length with a dark band in the center and on one end. i didn't know what to make of it. just thought folks would be interested in seeing this and maybe someone else has seen this before.
content.summary: Tubular ufo just above tree line.

content.detailedDescription: I had just returned from my break from work and as i started walking towards the building a bright light in the sky caught my eye.  it was roughly 25 degrees off the horizon and it was coming from the southwest.  it seemed to be blinking and as i observed further i noticed that it was the object itself that was blinking and not a smaller landing beacon or other kind of beacons that you would find on an airplane.  it was hard to ascertain the exact size as it was probably at least 1 mile away over the city, but i would definitely say it was larger than a star in the sky.  anyway as i continued to observe it, there was no pattern to the blinking; it would just randomly blink on then off then on again then it would pause and so on.  it looked like it was signaling something, akin to someone flashing their lights at you , very strange indeed.  finally the last time it blinked it never came back on and just vanished!  i waited an extra couple of minutes to see if it would come back on but it was gone.  i just found it very strange and wanted to report it in case someone else saw the same thing and knew what it was.  i would classify this as a ce-1.  i have had a sighting 11 years ago in northern michigan and also reported this to mufon.
content.summary: Blinking light up in the sky
